## ICircuitStorage.saveCircuitData() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

saves circuit files by circuit id

**Signature:**

```typescript
saveCircuitData(circuitId: CircuitId, circuitData: CircuitData): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  circuitId | [CircuitId](./js-sdk.circuitid.md) | circuit id |
|  circuitData | [CircuitData](./js-sdk.circuitdata.md) | circuit keys |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

`Promise<void>`
